column5: I’ve got 5 nights booked in Red Lake in August and my plan was to fish surrounding lakes with a square back canoe and a 6hp. I was considering Stormer, Berens, maybe Nungesser. Does anyone have any suggestions on other lakes in the area I could look into?

If you are looking for Smallmouth action Flat Lake by Madsen holds them. It is a small lake. Also holds Walleye but have never targeted them. We have done day trips from our lodge on Gullrock a couple times.
Zimmering. Close, not real big, remote, and infested with medium sized Northerns.Dixie. Just 7 miles South of RL.Little Trout.Certainly nothing wrong with Nungessor (sp)
gullrock is right there and it is a great lake to fish.
How the heck are you going to get into Nungesser? You'd have to hump your boat and motor around the rapids. Lotta work for one day of fishing.
Exactly the kind of input I’m looking for! Thank you!
Just jump in the rapids and see where it takes you 😎
I thought here's a Resources Development Road off of 125 that takes you there.One from our Spring group went there and didn't say anything about an inconvenience.
Correction:I just talked with they guy in our group.It was Faulkenhsm, not Nungessor.
Nungesser is great but it would require a portage around some falls.
